channel.title: museum on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in museum on Barefoot Rob

item.title: glass museum
item.description: 12:46 Saturday 19 August 2017 JST Allow more time when going to the glass museum in Azumino. Or maybe just go early. We went around 10:45 and there was a queue for blowing glass until 1pm. I did get to talk to a couple of guys down in the glass blowing room. Was soooo happy that they did not turn me away for being barefoot. I could easily imagine a rule, but apparently there was not.

item.title: wow amazing collection
item.description:
##02:13 Sunday 21 December 2014 JST## Okay, this guy’s house is a bit like a museum. He said he’s 82 years old, and has been collecting this all his adult life.
It’s all just in his house. I want to get a Japanese-speaking historian to interview this guy and something something something I don’t know what.
